actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 801 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that the Civil Aeronautics Board shall make the selection of air carriers in international route matters, subject to veto by the President within 90 days after such selection.

summary.text: Provides that the Civil Aeronautics Board shall make the selection of air carriers in international route matters, subject to veto by the President within ninety days after such selection. States that, in the case of a presidential veto, the Board shall immediately select another carrier. Requires that in no event shall the President direct the selection of a particular air carrier.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 801 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that the Civil Aeronautics Board shall make the selection of air carriers in international route matters, subject to veto by the President within 90 days after such selection.
